instructions: Find the Google Home speaker you want to use and tap on it . Tap the gear icon in the upper-right corner. Scroll down and tap Paired Bluetooth devices . Tap Enable pairing mode . Go to your phone's Bluetooth settings and tap your Google Home speaker from the list of available Bluetooth devices.
Open the Google app on your phone. Tap More on the bottom navigation bar. Tap Settings . Tap Voice . Tap Voice Match and ensure that Access with Voice Match is toggled on.
